description:
As a developer
  I want to ensure the application loads correctly
  So that BDD tests can run properly

steps.name: I navigate to "http://localhost:1420"
the page should load successfully
I should not see any console errors
the React app should be mounted to #root
I navigate to "http://localhost:1420"
the CSS should be loaded
the body should have dark theme styles applied
the background color should be "#18181b"

name: Application Health Check

steps.name: I navigate to "http://localhost:1420"
the React app should be mounted to #root
the CSS should be loaded

description:
As a user
  I want to navigate through the application
  So that I can create a SCORM course

steps.name: I navigate to the application
I should see the Dashboard

I should see "Create New Project" button
I navigate to the application
I click "Create New Project"
I should see a dialog with title "Create New Project"
I enter "Test Project" in the project name input
I click the Create button in the new project dialog
I should see the Course Seed Input step
the form should have a course title input
the Next button should be disabled

elements.name: Enable Next button with valid input

steps.name: I am on the Course Seed Input step
I enter "Test Course" as the course title
I enter the following topics:
the Next button should be enabled

description:
As a developer

  So that I can run more tests

steps.name: I open the application URL
the page should load successfully

name: Smoke Test

description:
As a course creator
  I want to create a complete SCORM course from start to finish
  So that I can deploy it to an LMS

elements.name: Create a basic SCORM course with all steps

steps.name: I have a clean browser state
the application is running at "http://localhost:1420"
I navigate to the SCORM Builder application
I enter the following course configuration:
I enter the following topics:
I should see the course preview update
I wait for auto-save to complete
I click the Next button
I should be on the "AI Prompt Generator" step
I should see the generated prompt containing:
I copy the AI prompt
I should see a success message "Copied!"
I click the Next button
I should be on the "JSON Import Validator" step
I paste the following JSON response:
I click the "Validate JSON" button
I should see "JSON is valid!"
I click the Next button
I should be on the "Media Enhancement Wizard" step
I should see tabs for "Welcome", "Objectives", and topic pages
I click on the "Welcome" tab
I search for images with keyword "web development"
I select the first image from search results
the welcome page should have an image
I click on the "HTML Fundamentals" tab
I upload a local image "html-diagram.png"
the topic should have the uploaded image
I click the Next button
I should be on the "Audio Narration Wizard" step
I should see the narration text for each page
I download the narration text file
a text file should be downloaded
I upload the audio ZIP file "narration-audio.zip"
all pages should show audio players
I upload the captions ZIP file "narration-captions.zip"
all pages should show caption indicators
I click the Next button
I should be on the "Activities Editor" step
I should see the knowledge check for "HTML Fundamentals"
I edit the knowledge check question
I change the question to "What is the purpose of HTML?"
I save the changes
the knowledge check should be updated
I click the Next button
I should be on the "SCORM Package Builder" step
I select SCORM version "1.2"
I set the pass mark to "80%"
I click "Preview Course"
I should see the course preview in an iframe
I close the preview
I click "Generate SCORM Package"
I should see "Generating package..."
a SCORM package should be downloaded

elements.name: Validate required fields at each step

I complete the course seed input with valid data
I proceed to the "JSON Import Validator" step
I paste invalid JSON

I save the project

I refresh the page

all my previous data should be loaded

the application is running at "http://localhost:1420"
I am on the "Media Enhancement Wizard" step

the topic should show an embedded video player

the network connection is restored

the application is running at "http://localhost:1420"
I navigate to the SCORM Builder application
I press Tab key repeatedly
focus should move through all interactive elements in order
I press Enter on the Next button
I should proceed to the next step
an error occurs

I complete a step successfully
success should be announced to screen readers

name: Complete SCORM Course Creation Workflow

description:
As a course creator

  So that I can generate a structured course

the course data should be saved

name: Working Test Suite

description:
As a course creator
  I want to create a complete SCORM package
  So that I can deploy it to an LMS

elements.name: Create a complete SCORM package from scratch

steps.name: I am on the dashboard page
I have created a new project called "E2E Test Course"
I am on the Course Seed Input step
I enter "Introduction to Testing" as the course title
I select "Technology" as the template
I add the following topics:
I set estimated time to "30" minutes
I set the number of questions to "5"
I click the "Next" button
I should be on the JSON Import/Validator step
I click "Skip JSON Import"
I should be on the AI Prompt Generator step
I review the generated prompt
I click "Copy Prompt"
I click the "Next" button
I should be on the Course Content Editor step
I paste the following content for module "What is Testing":
I click "Save Module"
I click the "Next" button
I should be on the Audio Narration step
I select "Skip narration for now"
I click the "Next" button
I should be on the Media Library step
I click "Skip media for now"
I click the "Next" button
I should be on the Export SCORM step
I select "SCORM 1.2" as the export format
I set the passing score to "80"
I click "Generate SCORM Package"
I should see "SCORM package generated successfully"
a SCORM package should be saved

elements.name: Quick SCORM creation with minimal steps

I skip through all optional steps
I reach the Export SCORM step
I click "Generate SCORM Package"
